Package Users

Interface UserInterface

All Known Subinterfaces:
CampUserInterface
public interface UserInterface
The UserInterface represents the interface for user-related operations in the system. Classes implementing this interface are responsible for handling user login and authentication.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    User
    authUser(String userId, String password)
    Authenticates a user based on the provided user ID and password.
    User
    login()
    Prompts the user to log in and returns the corresponding user object upon successful login.

  • Method Details

    • login

      User login()
      Prompts the user to log in and returns the corresponding user object upon successful login.
      Returns:
      The User object representing the logged-in user.

    • authUser

      User authUser(String userId, String password)
      Authenticates a user based on the provided user ID and password. Returns the authenticated User object if successful, or null if authentication fails.
      Parameters:
      userId - The user ID for authentication.
      password - The password for authentication.
      Returns:
      The authenticated User object, or null if authentication fails.
